page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT & INDUSTRY
page.content:
A survey was conducted in Coddington School on 8th July 1985 involving 166 families.
144 fathers worked (88%) 19 fathers were unemployed (12%) 70 mothers went out to work (42%) 96 mothers remained at home (58%)
One of the major areas of{employment in the Newark area is the Northern Road Industrial Estate. Units on the site range from small firms such as motor parts suppliers and printers to the large ball bearing{factory}on the southern end of the estate. There were 57{firms}on the estate in July 1985, welding companies, engineers, construction companies, gateaux manufacturers,caterers,tyre centres,newspaper printing works and clothing producers, to name a few.
